Module guigame
Package guigame.logic.objects

Class UserPaddle

java.lang.Object
guigame.logic.objects.GameObject
guigame.logic.objects.UserPaddle
public class UserPaddle
extends GameObject
Logic part to GUIUserPaddle. Holds important constants for GUI paddles.
See Also:
GUIUserPaddle

      private boolean toBall
      Whether the current UserPaddle is moving to the ball or to the center of the GameBoard.

    • moveToY

      private int moveToY
      The y-offset the current UserPaddle should be moving to. Will be initialized automatically.

      The random part of the y-offset.

    • diffOrMaxSpeed

      private int diffOrMaxSpeed​(int difference, int maxSpeed)
      Parameters:
      difference - the difference between the two coordinates
      maxSpeed - the maximum allowed speed for the paddle movement by an AI
      Returns:
      The speed the coordinates should be subtracted or added to.

    • containsYBall

      public boolean containsYBall​(float y, int ballHeight)
      Parameters:
      y - the y-offset of the paddle
      ballHeight - the ball's height
      Returns:
      Whether the current UserPaddle contains the ball's y-coordinates or not.
